comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Looks like same people as in www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2889448163/.

comment.author: 60174126@N00
comment._content: The bridge displayed here is the railroad bridge, which burned in 1974 but is still standing. It is no longer in use as a railroad bridge. Plans have been made to reopen it as a walking bridge. Normally, when people say the Poughkeepsie Bridge they are thinking of the automobile bridge a bit to the south of the railroad bridge. It was built in the 1930s after this picture was taken.

comment.author: 42026265@N08
comment._content: yeah the bridge is open fro walking now.
